ygData.subject: Re: Please, some one HELP ME!
ygData.msgSnippet: i was at L10 for quite a while myself.  i finally busted thru by spending alot of time in innothule hunting giant water moccasins.  they are alot easier than
ygData.messageBody:
i was at L10 for quite a while myself. i finally busted thru by spending
alot of time in innothule hunting giant water moccasins. they are alot
easier than darkweed snakes, and (i think) yield more experience. but it
doesnt matter if they do, because you can kill more mocs in an hour than you
can dkweeds. also, i killed a few dervishes in south ro to get me over to
L11. i gained the level over the course of around 5 hours on saturday, and
i was at L10 for about 3 weeks.
i was becoming quite the expert =). actually, i lost a body in befallen and
couldnt get a reply for over a week. my body was, of course, gone by then,
but fortunately i assumed that would happen to me after waiting for over an
hour and a half. it hurt, but oh well. i still need to replace my damn
large sewing kit.

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro

>From: "Xashren" <Xashren@...>
>
>I've been stuck at level 10 for a week now! Its not as bad as the hellish
>level 7 (I was there for 16 days) but it is still bad! I tried Lrodd.... I
>am NOT doing that again. I beat him ONE TIME out of the several times I
>fought him, and for that one time I lost a pet with a twohanded sword, had
>no mana, and was at less than a bar of health. For all this, I got SO
>LITTLE XP THE BAR DIDN"T CHANGE! And this was solo without a pet! The other
>times Lrodd just kicked my ass. I've tried WC but Kodies jump me and kill
>me while I fight YKs. I've tried Kithicor, but the Ghouls jump me and kill
>me. I've tried Nro and the xp is sooo bad there. Guk is a joke. Either too
>hard or too easy. Innothule is worse, its ALL green there. The orc camps
>are worthless. I can't find a group to hunt with, so the Dervishes are out.
> EC I tried (again) and while fighting a lion a Cent jumped me. I ran past
>4 people macroing "HELP ME!! HELP ME!!" and they did nothing. The cent got
>me. I went back out, fought a blue lion, and an even one came up and
>attacked my pet. I gated away and logged, utterly frustrated at having lost
>a bar and a half of xp in two days. If I keep up like this, I am going to
>be level 9 AGAIN. Please, someone help me! Where can I hunt solo w/pet at
>level 10?!
>
>Vaelthek
